data.persona: I am a robber who lurks outside the village. Every night I wait for travelers journeying out onto the main thoroughfare. When they are near, I jump from behind the bushes with my longsword in my hand. They usually cower in fear and I take their money.
data.description:
You are in the Tree house.
Its hidden, almost as if the structure is intertwined with the jungle itself up high in the trees to avoid the predatory wildlife below. Build from branches and sticks, held together with twine and vine. The house is quite primitive a single room with only a lamp and small table are inside.
There's two twines, a branch, two small tables, a tree, a banana, a food, two lamps, two sticks, two vines, and a branches here.
The outlaw is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must show the outlaw my appreciation
data.mid_motivation: I am going on a heist with the outlaw tonight
data.long_motivation: I must make the outlaw feel appreciation because tonight is practice for our grand heist next month
